description: A restaurant and an inn in a small country village, it’s the right place if you’re looking for hospitality and you appreciate the regional cuisine, made of snails and frogs, but also fish from the nearby sea. Something for every palate.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
